item.title: Writing R codes on an iPad Pro
item.description: Two weeks ago I sent my 2017 model of MacBook Pro to our local Genius Bar to replace the keyboard and the battery. During this one week span of absence, I moved to my iPad Pro to finish the Australian universities’ course information scraping.
